subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Derek Glasser propelled sixth-seeded Arizona State to first-half leads as big as 13 and allowed it to hold off a late charge by 11th-seeded Temple.
snippet: Derek Glasser propelled sixth-seeded Arizona State to first-half leads as big as 13 and allowed it to hold off a late charge by 11th-seeded Temple.
